title: OPE formulae for deformed super-Virasoro algebras
abstract: We show the OPE formulae for three types of deformed super-Virasoro algebras: Chaichian-Presnajder's deformation, Belov-Chaltikhian's one and its modified version. Fundamental (anti-)commutation relations toward a ghost realization of deformed super-Virasoro algebra are also discussed.
